verbs.description: Suddenly , the good fortune [V: is] melting away , imperiling the props that have supported American economic confidence and incomes and intensifying pressure on President Donald Trump to deliver the faster growth and higher wages he has promised .

[ARGM-ADV: Suddenly] , [ARG1: the good fortune] is [V: melting] [ARGM-DIR: away] , [ARGM-ADV: imperiling the props that have supported American economic confidence and incomes and intensifying pressure on President Donald Trump to deliver the faster growth and higher wages he has promised] .
